entry.title: CaramellDansen (Full Version + Lyrics)
entry.content: English: do-do-do-oo, yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah We wonder are you ready to join us now hands in the air we will show you how come and try caramell will be your guide So come and move your hips sing wha-aa look at hips, do it La-la-la you and me can sing this melody Oh-wa-aaa Dance to the beat Wave your hands together Come feel the heat forever and forever Listen and learn it is time for prancing Now we are here with caramel dancing Oo-oa-oa Oo-oa-oa-aa Oo-oa-oa Oo-oa-oa-aa From Sweden to UK we will bring our song, Australia, USA and people of Hong Kong. They have heard this meaning all around the world So come and move your hips sing wha-aa Look at your hips, do it La-la-la You and me can sing this melody So come and dance to the beat Wave your hands together Come feel the heat forever and forever Listen and learn it is time for prancing Now we are here with caramel dancing (Dance to the beat wave your hands together come feel the heat forever and forever listen and learn it is time for prancing now we are here with caramel dancing) Uu-ua-ua Uu-ua-ua-aa Uu-ua-ua Uu-ua-ua-aa So come and dance to the beat Wave your hands together Come feel the heat forever and forever Listen and learn it is time for prancing Now we are here with caramel dancing... Dance to the beat Wave your hands together Come feel the heat forever and forever Listen and learn it is time for prancing Now we are here with caramel dancing Swedish: Vi undrar är ni redo att vara med Armarna upp nu ska ni få se Kom ...

They have heard this meaning all around the world So come and move your hips sing wha-aa Look at your hips, do it La-la-la You and me can sing this melody So come and dance to the beat Wave your hands together Come feel the heat forever and forever Listen and learn it is time for prancing Now we are here with caramel dancing (Dance to the beat wave your hands together come feel the heat forever and forever listen and learn it is time for prancing now we are here with caramel dancing) Uu-ua-ua Uu-ua-ua-aa Uu-ua-ua Uu-ua-ua-aa So come and dance to the beat Wave your hands together Come feel the heat forever and forever Listen and learn it is time for prancing Now we are here with caramel dancing... entry.title: Caramelldansen SpeedyCake Remix Original Video
entry.content: Okai. Everyone. The original is a Swedish song in Swedish by the Swedish. This is that same song sped up by SpeedyCake (Who are Japanese). THe video is Japanese anime. All this remix is, is the original sped up. This is the most common and popular one. There, now STFU.

entry.title: Caramell Dansen Misheard Lyrics
entry.content: 2nd Misheard Lyrics Video is up! www.youtube.com Update: I have received a lot of comments about the nature of Misheard Lyrics. Yes, I know the song is in Swedish and that the lyrics do not make sense. That's the whole point - to have fun with it! Anime Used: Lucky Star, Death Note, Haruhi Suzumiya, a few others. yuki-snowcraft.deviantart.com Thank you so much everyone! 500000 views! entry.title: Gaara and Lee, Caramelldansen
entry.content: Edit: Why are there so many arguments...? Keep the peace, people! It's just a harmless video! **Notice: I'm taking a break from sending the mp3 since I've been really busy lately and I get around to sending it too late. I'll be able to send it out again soon, so don't worry.** **I DID NOT MAKE THIS PIC, FULL CREDIT GOES TO: freddychick.deviantart.com ** All I did was speed it up and add the audio. Enjoy!

entry.title: Lucky Star Caramelldansen
entry.content: I've jumped on the Caramelldansen bandwagon, and made my first non-KH video! I hope you like, I was inspired by the Suzumiya Haruhi ver. of this song. Song: Caramelldansen (Speedycake Remix) Artist: Caramell Anime used: Lucky Star (belongs to Kadokawa) I've made a better version of this video using the dance portion from ep. 24, check it out if you'd like: youtube.com I hope you all like! No profit is being made off of this. I am not affiliated in any way with the makers of this song/anime.

entry.title: Caramelldansen (Speedycake Remix), DamDam Prod's video clip!
entry.content: Check this for information : damdamprod.over-blog.com www.collectif-touindin.com Directed by Damien Ratte Featuring : Isabelle Jeudy, Nono The Big Ghetto, The Yoman, and many other friends of mine! Alright, so what we got here? Here is a video clip I made with friends on a famous music : Caramelldansen from CARAMELL, the Speedycake Remix. This remix is well-known for the famous animation with the girls from the anime Popotan. So enjoy this, (I hope you'll do), it's dedicated to Ryzen Xia, ATomik, Reka, MrO, Cosplayman, Mana, and everybody who like highspeed dance!!

entry.title: Caramel Dansen!
entry.content: EDIT: Watch in High Quality, Standard Quality is...ew... It's the dance craze that's sweeping the internet! This is basically just a collage of various little animations I've found around DA and some clips from Avatar. Sorry for the repetition, the number of Caramell Dansen clips of characters I know and recognized were limited. If I can find more, I'll remake this. For now, enjoy :D EDIT: Oh jeez! I TOTALLY forgot to give credit to the wonderful folks responsible for these lovely GIFs! And here they are! Azula, Ty Lee, and Mai--vick300 Carmel Dance (pic at the end)--LissyFishy Ed and Al--Eko_san Cloud, Zach, and Aeris (Aerith if you're picky)--meru_chan Dedede--Evanatt Futurama Dansen--turynn House Dansen--Butterstick Aang and Zuko--TinyYellowMouse Snake and Lucario--dj_INFERNO Watertribe Dansen-Hentai_Sweetie

entry.title: One Piece Caramelldansen
entry.content: WATCH IN HIGH QUALITY! My 2nd Animation! XD I have been doing this for 6 months, but that was only because I wasn't working on it all the time. My bf Luffyonepiece helped me come up with loads of ideas for things, like the transistions. My brother, Tigerdav, did the water animation on my Laboon. Song - Caramelldansen (Speedy Cake Remix) #58 - Top Favorited (Today) - Film & Animation - United Kingdom #55 - Top Rated (Today) - Film & Animation - United Kingdom #67 - Top Favorited (This Month) - Film & Animation

entry.title: Caramelldansen (original version)
entry.content: This is my first AMV, so please go easy on me. and please dont get scared away by tokyo mew mew.You can tell I got lazy around the part with Azumanga Daioh... and youtube quality sucks, so the gifs look really blurry, even though they already looked a little blurry to begin with. and at first, the beggining was the original dance from popotan, but i thought that was too boring, so i found this tokyo mew mew thing and put it there cuz it matched. and that really long part of azumanga where they are flying is on double speed ^_^; now that I've pretty much completely down-graded my vid, enjoy ^_^ (i also have a new respect for people making really awesome amvs in movie maker) anime used: 0:00 - 0:19 - Tokyo Mew Mew 0:19 - 0:35﻿ - Popotan 0:35 - 1:07 - Lucky Star 1:07 - 1:16 - Haruhi Suzumiya 1:16 - 1:23 - Lucky Star 1:23 - 1:55 - Azumanga Daioh 1:56 - 1:59 - Lucky Star 2:00 - 2:09﻿ - Haruhi Suzumiya 2:09 - 2:15 - Popotan 2:15 - 2:18 - Haruhi Suzumiya 2:18 - 2:28 - FullMetal Alchemist 2:28 - 2:55 - Haruhi Suzumiya 2:55 - 3:10 - Lucky Star 3:10 - 3:27 - Haruhi Suzumiya Song: Caramelldansen by Caramell DISCLAIMER: I DO NOT OWN THE AUDIO OR VISUALS

media:group.media:description: This is my first AMV, so please go easy on me. and please dont get scared away by tokyo mew mew.You can tell I got lazy around the part with Azumanga Daioh... and youtube quality sucks, so the gifs look really blurry, even though they already looked a little blurry to begin with. and at first, the beggining was the original dance from popotan, but i thought that was too boring, so i found this tokyo mew mew thing and put it there cuz it matched. and that really long part of azumanga where they are flying is on double speed ^_^; now that I've pretty much completely down-graded my vid, enjoy ^_^ (i also have a new respect for people making really awesome amvs in movie maker) anime used: 0:00 - 0:19 - Tokyo Mew Mew 0:19 - 0:35﻿ - Popotan 0:35 - 1:07 - Lucky Star 1:07 - 1:16 - Haruhi Suzumiya 1:16 - 1:23 - Lucky Star 1:23 - 1:55 - Azumanga Daioh 1:56 - 1:59 - Lucky Star 2:00 - 2:09﻿ - Haruhi Suzumiya 2:09 - 2:15 - Popotan 2:15 - 2:18 - Haruhi Suzumiya 2:18 - 2:28 - FullMetal Alchemist 2:28 - 2:55 - Haruhi Suzumiya 2:55 - 3:10 - Lucky Star 3:10 - 3:27 - Haruhi Suzumiya Song: Caramelldansen by Caramell DISCLAIMER: I DO NOT OWN THE AUDIO OR VISUALS
media:group.media:keywords: caramelldansen, meloncholy, haruhi, suzumiya, yuutsu, lucky, star, anime, popotan, dance, azumanga, daioh, amv, hare, yukai
media:group.media:title: Caramelldansen (original version)

app:control.yt:state: Syndication of this video was restricted by its owner.

entry.title: Gundam 00 : "Caramelldansen" by Caramell
entry.content: ---- anime: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 / Kidou Senshi Gundam Double O / 機動戦士ガンダム00 song: "Caramelldansen" by Caramell ---- Just another version of Caramelldansen. Appearing characters (in order): 1. Lockon Stratos & Setsuna F. Seiei 2. Allelujah Haptism & Tieria Erde 3. Christina Sierra & Feldt Grace 4. Sumeragi Lee Noriega 5. Graham Aker & Billy Katagiri 6. Soma Peries & Sergei Smirnov 7. Patrick Colasour & Kathy Mannekin 8. Patrick, Soma, Setsuna & Graham 9. Lockon, Haro & Feldt 10. Marina Ismail 11. Louise Halevy & Saji Crossroad 12. Hallelujah & Allelujah 13. Bridge Bunnies 14. Gundam Meisters Before you ask - YES, these are the official romanizations (except for Kathy, I'm not sure about her surname).
